question: The country's first Super Fab Lab (Fabrication laboratory) is to be set up in which state?
explanation:
The country\'s first Super Fab Lab (Fabrication laboratory) was recently launched at the Integrated Startup Complex of the Kerala Startup Mission (KSUM). The facility was inaugurated by the Chief Minister of Kerala, Pinarayi Vijayan.
This fab lab, which is the only such facility outside the United States, will function in collaboration with the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). The KSUM Super Fab Lab comprises a 10,000 square feet area and has state-of-the-art machines worth more than Rs 7 Crores. This will enable the state to produce machines locally and boost the hardware industry of India.
